text: Hi! Is it possible to use HTML inside HubSpot tickets? i would need to use an anchor tag to create a link

Has this issue with Favicons on HubSpot CMS Free been fixed yet?
As I personally don’t think it has :neutral_face: - <https://community.HubSpot.com/t5/Blog-Website-Page-Publishing/Favicon-Not-Showing/td-p/690010>
We had some issues with our sandbox last week where the theme modules disappeared, but I haven't seen where the add button becomes disabled. Are you in any betas?
Good Day everyone! May all your code work the first time you hit save.
Inquiry. Has anyone used the HubSpot *HubSpot-fields-js* theme fields? According to documentation it looks like this is made for module fields?
Do lead scoring attributes like page views and session length work for website built in another CMS, like Drupal or Wordpress?
I am developing an HubSpot chatbot, i need to fetch their country code, calling code number , country , region details, how could i get that.?
Is there a way to get access.log file ?
Hey Leandro, please avoid promoting any services in this Slack. Thank you! <https://developers.HubSpot.com/slack/code-of-conduct#unwanted-solicitation-of-services>
<@U03AKL6Q1B2> Do you mean the HubSpot CMS version? I’m not sure where to find that
No, but we think we already ruled out that possiblity

Ok we found the issue!
They were dynamic pages templates, thus we need to select the data source under Settings > Advanced options
:man-facepalming:
